snippet: A collection of antivenin is stored at the Bronx Zoo because it is just a few miles from Jacobi Medical Center, which has one of the nation's leading snakebite-treatment centers.
abstract: A collection of antivenin is stored at the Bronx Zoo because it is just a few miles from Jacobi Medical Center, which has one of the nation's leading snakebite-treatment centers.

headline.main: Near the Zoo's Snakes, a Hospital's Collection of Medicine
headline.print_headline: Zoo Keeps Invaluable Antidotes for Doctors Who Treat Snakebites
